topicTitle: SoRry but we are unable to accept youre application at this?

posts.postText: Does mean we arnt good enough, too many apps? Just seems like a pretty broad statement :3 please do tell
Well there was a ton of apps, so I'm assuming that is the reason.

http://9gag.com/gag/235900

My reply to a denied app ;)
We just can't accept everyone. It's not suppose to mean it's a bad thing necessarilly, it's just that we weren't looking for a person like you currently.

>> Does mean we arnt good enough, too many apps? Just seems like a pretty broad statement :3 please do tell 
Usualy, there's nothing wrong with you, sometimes, you're even well suited for the position. Sadly, they have to take everything into account, like the time frames the player is online, their standing with the community, how well they would mod, everything... and even if a person seems perfect, if there is someone slightly better, they have to go with that guy, to maximize security.
In short, those who recieve that message, they are not the best choice, though still possibly a good choice.
Yes.. and their best choices are... whiners and...lol nevermind.. I don't want to get banned for speaking the truth...

>> Yes.. and their best choices are... whiners and...lol nevermind.. I don't want to get banned for speaking the truth... 

That sentence itself is a whine.

This is also wine.  http://babelwine.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Wine-with-Soul2.jpg
